text: The brown blotched Bengal tree frog or brown blotched whipping frog (Polypedates bengalensis) is a frog. It lives in India.People have seen it between 7 and 13 meters above sea level. People have seen this frog in small pieces of forest and on bamboo and banana plants in gardens. ==References== Category:Frogs of Asia
title: Polypedates bengalensis
